name: AutonomeBackup
short_description: Autonome Backup is a tool designed to backup certain number of directories in an autonomous way. Next to a generic backup tool, it also controls the power of an external harddisk which is used to store the backups on. For small amounts of data, it can also store the backups on a number of cloud services. This tool is intended for home users which need to backup data on their PC. It is available for windows, linux and mac.
